title: Hey How do we Get the Riot Fist bump ward and anybody willing to give me a code for na?
body: hey i just wanted to know how to get the fist bump ward and if anybody was willing to give me a code for na.

replies.body:
Hey Bleni,

This ward skin is generally given away when you meet a Rioter IRL, at an event, or otherwise. :]
Maybe you could consider adding it as a reward for that whole play with a rioter for 1000th win thing to ease up on the rarity,
Does this count as meeting you otherwise? :D
If you meet us when we're just hanging out at a coffee shop, or whatnot, yup! This doesn't count, unfortunately. D:
Ah, had to try. No matter how far fetched. :)

>
> Hey Bleni,
> 
> This ward skin is generally given away when you meet a Rioter IRL, at an event, or otherwise. :]

So in order to get it you have to dish out hundreds if not thousands of dollars to go to cons that aren't anywhere near you and track down a rioter and bug them for a code? 

Am I the only person to find the system to be rather idiotic? I mean skins you just give Riot money and they give you premium content but to go as far as having to travel to get something like a ward skin just seems a bit excessive.
Not necessarily - it's not only events. I've met players in airports when traveling back home.
